fields.Description: We need many different solutions for bitcoin custody that work for diverse individuals and communities around the globe. For example, FediMint is a protocol for payments and custody in a community-context. How will this be used considering cultural and geographical differences? What other custody solutions do we need?
fields.Name: Our keys, our coins

fields.Description: The foundation of Lightning is maturing, and new protocols and capabilities are built in top. Lightning applications are becoming incredibly easy to build. What new and exciting things can we do with that?
fields.Name: Future of lightning

fields.Description: Images created through artificial intelligence (Dall-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion) have been a hot trend (see lexica.art). Letâ€™s explore these new tools together.
fields.Name: Bitcoin AI art
